remarks: Lemma for ~ mdsymi .  This is the converse direction of Lemma 4(i) of [Maeda] p. 168, and is based on the proof of Theorem 1(d) to (e) of [Maeda] p. 167.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Jul-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
